segments.text: Can you lend me fifty bucks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Again ? Why do you keep running out of money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I don't earn enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I think it's how you budget your life , that's the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True enough , until the time comes that you need to take my money . I don't know where you're wasting your money but I think you need to take a look at what's really important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how do you survive from pay day to pay day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't just survive . I put money away as well . I know when I get paid where most of the cash will go , and I stick to my plan . If I follow a budget I don't have any nasty surprises .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not disciplined enough I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a few months I'm planning to invest my money into some foreign companies . I think you need to reevaluate your spending habits .
segments.speaker: S2
